problem.markdown:
What did you do, in this course?
( ) I just browsed the content – watched some videos, and answered some questions. ( ) I completed some course activities, but not enough to earn a certifiate. ( ) I completed enough course activities and watched all the videos and most of the quizzes. ( ) I hardly participated in any course activities.
problem.p: What did you do, in this course?

choicegroup.choice: I just browsed the content – watched some videos, and answered some questions.
I completed some course activities, but not enough to earn a certifiate.
I completed enough course activities and watched all the videos and most of the quizzes.
I hardly participated in any course activities.
